transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Main Krishna ji baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Ji boliye.
Executive: Sir main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hun, senior manager. Kaise hain aap sir?
Customer: Main badhiya hun, bataiye.
Executive: Haan ji sir, aapki side se ek feedback receive hua tha sir. Aapki Bulbul se baat hui hogi na jo aapke account manager hain?
Customer: Right. Ji.
Executive: Haan ji, to aapki side se mujhe ek negative feedback receive hua tha. Ab wo conversation jo hua tha uske bihaf pe, to kuch issue hua tha kya sir kal jab aap unse baat kar rahe the?
Executive: Ya phir IndiaMART ki service ko leke kuch issue hai sir?
Customer: Actually kya hai ki jo ye meri nayi account manager hai Miss Bulbul, unko kuch pata hi nahi rehta mere account ke bare mein. Matlab every quarter she will call me once and sab cheez mujhi se puchhengi and mujhi ko wahi cheez wapas bhi batayengi jo cheeze mujhe already pata hai. There is nothing new and she always asks the same question aur mere account ke bare mein unko zero knowledge hai, zero knowledge.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: So this is, this is not a responsibility of account manager jinko pata hi nahi ki mere account mein ho kya raha hai. Har cheez mujhi se puchh ke aur phir directly agar kuch nahi samajh mein aa raha to aap seedhe package badha lijiye.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Inse pehle jo bhi mera kya kehte hain account manager tha, he was such a good person. Matlab maine unke liye bhi kaha tha ki wo mera dhang se nahi dekhte phir unhone mera dekhna shuru kiya tha. He has improved my account in many ways. Main pehle leads nahi consume karta tha, leads achchi nahi aati thi, un sab ki issue unhone solve kari. Usko dhang se kara. Meri leads consumption badh gaya. Agar aap dekhenge to jab maine package liya tha aur jo main abhi leads consume karta hun usme there is a drastic change.
Executive: Yes. Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: And usse mere kya kehte hain conversion bhi hua hai. Pehle meri leads se sale mein conversion nahi hota tha but now two-three leads has become my sales also. So wo cheez meri ek improve hui hai. But lekin jab kya kehte hain yahi mein mere ko aisa lagta hai bas ek duty call hai unki Miss Bulbul ki jo mere ko bas ek quarter mein unhone call kar liya, unse puchh liya, baat kar li to unka dikh gaya ki haan maine baat kar li.
Executive: Main bilkul samajh gayi sir. Aap please mujhe bataiye sir agar service ko leke koi concern hai to main aapko solve karke deti hun. Aur agar aapko meri side se chahiye ki matlab suggestion aapko lena hai ki aapki jo service hai usme kya-kya improvement hone chahiye wo bhi main aapko guide karti hun sir. Jisko improve karne se for sure hamari service pe bahut achcha impact padega.
Executive: Aap pehle ek bari please apni side se bataiye, bataiye agar kuch problem specific aa raha hai to main usko solve karke deti hun. Otherwise to main abhi batati hun kyunki maine ek-do cheeze aap se baat karne se pehle aapka pura catalog go through kiya tha jo meri side se maine ek-do cheeze find out kari hai.
Customer: Achha, bataiye aap.
Executive: Haan ji. So meri jo findings hai sir aapki profile ko lekar ke ek to mere khayal se apna social media to aapne link kara hi liya hai na? Social media se to apna link kara hi rakha hai aapne profile ko, thik hai. Social media ke links bhi added hai. To sabse actually kya hota hai na jab hum ek product koi bhi upload karte hain hamare catalog mein to us product ko upload karte time pe bas humen na kuch specification dalna hota hai.
Executive: Specification aapne dal rakhi hai har ek product ki. But kuch hamare pass kuch specification aisi hoti hai na jinko add karna mandatory hota hai. Uske wo add kiye bina na hamari catalog ka specification part jo hai wo incomplete sa reh jata hai. Jaise for example, ek aapka Cisco Mangal Steel I-beam karke product hai.
Executive: Thik hai?
Executive: Ab isme standard missing hai iska aur iska size missing hai isme. Iska height kitna hai, iska width kitna hai. To ye sab cheeze missing hai.
Customer: [inaudible] likha tha. Ye aapke side se kisi ne remove kara hai. Aap mujhe ek cheez bataiye maine jab sare products add kare hain, maine product description mein har ek cheez likhi hai to why would you have added the standard and the size and height and width in that section?
Executive: Main bilkul aapki baat samajh gayi but sir ye remove karna hamare hath mein nahi hota hai kyunki hum admin panel se aapke
Customer: Nahi mera pehle bhi ho chuka hai aise. Bahut baar mera pehle bhi ho chuka hai iske iske regarding maine concern bhi raise kiya tha.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Unhone phir mere se koi option hatwa diya.
Executive: Aapke bahut sare products mein aapke bahut sare products mein added hai sir. Kuch ek product hai jis maine aapko ye product ka naam bataya isme abhi added nahi hai.
Customer: Exactly point hai agar sab mein added hai to how could it be possible ki maine ek-do product mein miss kar diya. I am very sure, which I am very sure ki maine add kara hai.
Executive: Main aapko batati hun. Yes. Yes. You are sure about it sir? [inaudible] like haan. Meri team hai maine unke sath hi baith ke karwaya hai ye.
Executive: Sir main wahi aapko batana chah rahi hun aap I think confuse ho rahe hain specification aur description mein. Aapka ye part description mein added hai. Jo product ka description hai usme aapka width bhi added hai. Usme aapka width of surface bhi added hai. Isme iska height bhi added hai, width of pipe bhi added hai, sab kuch added hai. But I am talking about specification sir.
Executive: Product description mein hai, specification mein nahi hai. If you are giving the me the permission, main ek kaam karti hun isko apni side se aapka jo product ka description hai wahan se utha kar ke aapke specification mein add kara deti hun.
Customer: Aap ye bhi kar sakte hain. You tell me ki main kar main karwa dunga. Jaisa bhi aapko better lage.
Executive: Agar aapki side se aap kara sakte ho to bahut hi badhiya cheez hai sir kyunki aapko aapke product ki mere se zyada knowledge hai otherwise agar main karungi to main aapka product description dekh ke hi usko add kar paungi.
Customer: Ah main isko apni side se kara deta hun.
Executive: Aap apni side se kara dijiyega. Jaise hi aap apna catalog khologe na sir, jaise hi aap product page pe jaoge to wahan pe na aapko jaise aap apna product dekhoge to aapko samne hi add karke plus ka nishan ek dikhega usme add karke ek option aa jayega. To aapko dikh jayega kahan pe kya cheeze missing hai. Uske aage red mein missing bhi likha hoga.
Customer: Hmm, dekh raha hun. Aap isko yes. Aap isko complete kara lijiye. Ek aur option abhi aaj hi subah na hamari ek training hui hai. To hamare PQRS ko lekar ke ek option hamare pass aaya tha. Main ek bar dekh leti hun wo option kahan pe aata hai. Haan.
Executive: Yes. To agar aapne catalog khola hua hai, products pe aap jayenge. Products pe jane ke baad aapke right hand side pe ek more options ka ek option aa raha hoga karke. Usme drop down laga hoga. Usme third option hai aapka category report ka.
summary:
Concerns:

- Account manager has zero knowledge of account.

- Account manager only makes duty calls.

- Standard and size missing from product specification.



Resolution:

- Executive listened to the customer's concerns.

- Executive offered to add missing specifications.

- Executive informed about category report option.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will add missing specifications.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, product specification, catalog, training
